tasks.subject: Generate a cheat sheet image of all Claude skills using Gemini
tasks.description: Read my skills list from C:\Users\user\.claude\CLAUDE.md, then use the nano-banana-poster skill to generate a beautiful cheat sheet image showing ALL my available skills organized by category. Make it visually appealing, clean and modern. Save the image to C:\Users\user\Desktop. Use default 3:2 aspect ratio.
tasks.prompt: Read my skills list from C:\Users\user\.claude\CLAUDE.md, then use the nano-banana-poster skill to generate a beautiful cheat sheet image showing ALL my available skills organized by category. Make it visually appealing, clean and modern. Save the image to C:\Users\user\Desktop. Use default 3:2 aspect ratio.
tasks.last_result: failed - claude command not found in PATH

tasks.subject: Write Europe PMC search script
tasks.description: Create fetch_europepmc.py using the free REST API. Use 3-concept search from concept_blocks.json. Match output format of existing scripts (title, authors, year, doi, abstract, source, journal).

tasks.subject: Write Web of Science Starter API script
tasks.description: Create fetch_wos.py using free WoS Starter API. Use query from search/wos_strategy.txt. No API key needed for starter tier.
tasks.activeForm: Writing Web of Science search script

tasks.subject: Write Google Scholar script using scholarly
tasks.description: Create fetch_google_scholar.py using scholarly Python library. Run 6 searches from search/google_scholar_strategy.txt. Handle rate limiting.

tasks.subject: Export PsycINFO results from browser
tasks.description: BLOCKED: Chrome extension lacks permission for psycnet.apa.org. Researcher must manually export CSV from PsycNet browser tab to references/raw/psycinfo_export.csv

tasks.subject: Export Scopus results from browser
tasks.description: BLOCKED: Chrome extension lacks permission for scopus.com. Researcher must run search from scopus_strategy.txt and export CSV to references/raw/scopus_export.csv

tasks.subject: Write preprint search script (medRxiv + PsyArXiv)
tasks.description: Create fetch_preprints.py using medRxiv API and OSF/PsyArXiv API for grey literature.

tasks.subject: Update deduplication and regenerate unified list
tasks.description: Remove OpenAlex records, integrate all new sources, run deduplicate.py, regenerate unified_list.json, update search_log.json and project_config.json

tasks.subject: Phase 1: Create security foundation
tasks.description: Create input validation functions, safe command executor, .env setup, and prompt injection validator

tasks.subject: Phase 10: Final polish
tasks.description: Create /task-center skill, add to CLAUDE.md, performance testing, security audit, user guide

tasks.subject: Phase 2: Create core infrastructure
tasks.description: Create directory structure, aggregate-tasks.js with streaming, JSONL logs, delta sync, debounced watchers

tasks.subject: Phase 3: Create health monitoring + self-correction
tasks.description: Create health-check.ps1, run-claude-task.ps1, setup Windows Task Scheduler, implement 3-step self-correction

tasks.subject: Phase 4: Create mobile-first web dashboard
tasks.description: Create responsive HTML/CSS, drag & drop, touch controls, card-based display, Quick Fix sidebar, Hebrew RTL

tasks.subject: Phase 5: Deploy to GitHub Pages
tasks.description: Create repository, enable Pages, create sync script with OAuth 2.0 + PKCE, test bidirectional sync

tasks.subject: Phase 6: Create self-learning system
tasks.description: Implement error pattern matching, fix application with user confirmation, store patterns in error-patterns.json, track success rates

tasks.subject: Phase 7: Create agent & skill management
tasks.description: Add skill/agent dropdowns, agent launcher, running agents status, create skill/agent as tracked task

tasks.subject: Phase 8: Create skill factory with natural language
tasks.description: Natural language skill/agent creation, skill browser with descriptions, searchable list, one-click assignment

tasks.subject: Phase 9: Add notifications
tasks.description: Windows Toast notifications, WhatsApp alerts via Green API, notification preferences

tasks.subject: Search flights TLV→Rome (May 3) + Milan→TLV (May 14/15)
tasks.description:
Search Google Flights for open-jaw tickets:
- Outbound: Tel Aviv (TLV) → Rome (FCO), May 3, 2026
- Return: Milan (MXP) → Tel Aviv (TLV), May 14 OR May 15, 2026
- Passengers: 5 (2 adults + 3 children ages 9, 7, 4)
- Airlines to check: El Al, ITA Airways, Wizz Air
- Budget: $3,000-4,500 for all 5 passengers

tasks.subject: Search car rental Rome→Milan one-way (May 6-14/15)
tasks.description:
Search Discover Cars / RentalCars for:
- Pickup: Rome (city center or Termini), May 6, 2026
- Dropoff: Milan Malpensa Airport (MXP), May 14 or 15, 2026
- Duration: 8-9 days
- Compare: 5-seat vs 7-seat options
- Sites: discovercars.com, rentalcars.com, autoeurope.com
- Budget: $400-900

tasks.subject: Find Rome apartment (May 3-6, 3 nights)
tasks.description:
Search Airbnb for Rome apartment:
- Dates: May 3-6, 2026
- Guests: 5 (2 adults, 3 children)
- Requirements: 2-3 bedrooms, full kitchen
- Areas: Trastevere, Prati, or near Villa Borghese
- Budget: €100-150/night (€300-450 total)

tasks.subject: Find Tuscany agriturismo (May 6-10, 4 nights) - SHABBAT
tasks.description:
PRIORITY: This is for Shabbat (May 9-10)
Search for self-contained villa/agriturismo in Tuscany:
- Dates: May 6-10, 2026
- Location: Near Siena/San Gimignano
- Requirements: Full kitchen, pool, private yard/garden
- Sites: myitalyselection.com, agriturismo.it, Airbnb (farm stay filter)
- Budget: €150-250/night (€600-1,000 total)
- Must be self-contained for Shabbat observance

tasks.subject: Find Lake Garda hotel (May 10-12, 2 nights)
tasks.description:
Search for family hotel at Lake Garda:
- Dates: May 10-12, 2026
- Areas: Peschiera del Garda or Sirmione (flat, easy with kids)
- Requirements: Family-friendly, near lake
- Budget: €100-150/night (€200-300 total)

tasks.subject: Find Lake Como accommodation (May 12-14/15, 2-3 nights)
tasks.description:
Search for accommodation at Lake Como:
- Dates: May 12-14 or 15, 2026
- Areas: Bellagio, Varenna, or Menaggio
- Note: Lake Como is hilly - prefer flat areas for kids
- Budget: €120-180/night (€240-540 total)

tasks.subject: Create final day-by-day itinerary
tasks.description:
After all bookings confirmed, create detailed itinerary with:
- Daily schedule with times
- Driving routes and durations
- Activity suggestions
- Shabbat prep timeline (Thursday shopping)
- Supermarket locations (Esselunga, Coop, Conad)
- Emergency contacts
